climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Ready Made: Package includes 2 panels of W52"x L84"(132cm x 213cm) each | W104"x L84"(264cm x 213cm) in total. Each panel has 8 solid grommets (1.6" inner) which fit most standard rods.
Luxury Look: These velvet curtains feature silky-smooth touch and beautiful drape sense, which creates a warm elegant feeling to rooms.

Light Dimming: Thick and heavy velvet drapes can block most sunlight to create a dark and cozy environment to better TV viewing or sleeping. Meanwhile, resisting summer heat & winter chill to lower cost.
Easy Care: Machine wash（gentle cycle) or dry clean. Use steam iron on low heat from the back to straighten and remove creases/wrinkles from package.
More Choice: StangH has various styles of Velvet Curtains, Valances, Velvet Pillow Covers to meet your ideal for home decor. If you have any requirements, please email your request to us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Super Soft Premium Velvet Made of super plush velvet material, soft, smooth, and skin friendly, creating luxurious and elegance. Quite a good choice for gifts, living room, office, bedroom, room dividers... Multiple Functions Rich and thick velvet can impede unwanted light and UV ray, darken the room while protecting privacy. They are thermal insulated and can regulate indoor temperature effectively.

How do I find the color samples and custom size curtains? Please send emails for details. We will response within 24 hours for any issues. Are the colors correct in the image? We have images and videos to show the colors. They are almost similar with the actual, but due to different display devices or lighting environment, they may appear chromatic aberration. Will these velvet curtains truly blackout? Since they don't have the back liner, the thick fabric can be room darkening and truly privacy. The darker colors can work better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not really “blackout” BUT…
reviews.reviewText: These are a made from a good quality and relatively thick fabric which block a good amount of sunlight but if you’re seeking true blackout drapes, you will need to be creative to achieve a completely dark room with these as they are not lined at all. Since the seller indicated these drapes aren’t true blackout within the description, I purchased a blackout reflective panel that adheres to the window with Velcro adhesive strips and prior to hanging the drapes, applied it to the glass.I’ve never liked the texture of blackout drapes as they feel stiff and plasticky so I opted for a solution that allowed for a richer aesthetic. Obviously these drapes remain closed since the glass has been fitted with a heat reflective panel in order to keep out the desert heat here in Las Vegas, where I live.I am extremely happy with these beautiful velvet drapes and love how they hang, feel, look PLUS they deliver exactly what I was hoping for.The color is perfect and I was torn between several options. I took several weeks of looking at different types of fabrics, colors and at every seller on Amazon to finally make my decision. I was originally going to use a linen fabric with blackout panels sewn into the backing but when I came across these I began to rethink it altogether. I could not be more satisfied with my choice to change the fabric to velvet and to go with a color I’d not considered at all. The stone blue is very forgiving as it has a slightly green hue and is a sneaky “color shifting” shade that would fit just about any pallet. The room is predominantly furnished with dark blues and a plush multicolored area rug with a cream/off white background, the carpet’s muted blues, greens and pastel reddish pink touches just look lovely with these rich velvet, flowing drapes.Upon arrival I threw these in the washer, I bought 2 packages so all 4 panels went in on the “bulky”cycle with warm water. Since they’re polyester I expected no shrinkage. I dried them partially, leaving them slightly damp and hung them immediately. This technique works on heavier fabrics to remove most wrinkles as the weight itself aids in removing fold marks. I employed a hand held steamer (if you don’t own one, get one as it’ll change your life) to get out any stubborn wrinkles. I cannot imagine a better result. You don’t need an expensive steamer as they all use the same technology and I use it frequently instead of an iron.One thing I noticed while setting out on this journey of drape buying online, is that the same exact products are sold by many merchants and prices are definitely not consistent. I found myself chasing my tail when looking for that elusive best price. The day after I hung my drapes, a different seller had the same drapes at a 40% lower price. The photos and diagrams are identical from one vendor to the next plus the color charts and names of each color are the same. To say I felt disappointed to find that had I waited a day to save 40% Is an understatement. But I’d hung the drapes and I work alone and it’s a tricky process when hanging heavier fabric. As I’m not an acrobat and will not allow my husband to be involved, as that quickly becomes a liability due to using a “mansplain” translation decoder ring and putting us in the crosshairs of divorce, I quickly realized that forgetting about losing out on saving some money was not all that important.I highly recommend these and if you are considering a divorce, to get that ball rolling, ask your spouse to “assist” which will likely bring out your inner Cujo.Arrived when promised but mediocrely packaged. Mine were fineYes- order them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2020
Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 packs, (4 panels total), 108 inch, in the color; bleach white. I was nervous about the color and weight as I was ordering them but was pleasantly surprised when they arrived! The color is pure white - just as I wanted, and looked great against my off - white walls. I hung them in my living room that is beige, tan, & white (with color accents). The fabric is not a real velvet (I have to say that to be honest) but they are a wonderful soft, velvety like, textured material. The panels have a good weight and are constructed nicely with a nice bottom pocket hem. The wrinkles steamed out pretty easy with my small portable hand steamer. A few remaining wrinkles that I could not reach shook out in a few days. Lastly, the curtains are opaque enough that you can’t see in my living room from the outside, but allows a good amount of filtered light in so the room is not blacked out. I highly recommend these curtains and would buy them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice panels
reviews.reviewText: The velvet was soft, but not thick velvet that you dig your fingertips into, light enough to slide back and forth easily on the curtain rod. It’s nice you get 2 panels for the price. I was making a divider wall with them, and they were so nice I ordered another set. Very nice overall!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE these Curtains!
reviews.reviewText: These are just what we wanted. We wanted a winter type curtain that would go with our buffalo plaid bedspread for the winter season. And boy, do they black out the light! Sometimes it makes it hard to get up in the mornings! They lay nicely and feel so soft yet still have nice curtain structure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the price
reviews.reviewText: Very nice drapes - bought 4 pair for 2 bedrooms and living room window and patio sliders which are side by side. The light grey color blends perfectly with our decor. The velvet material is very soft and hangs nicely. They are ceiling to floor - hoping the slight wrinkles will ease out as they hang.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: FIrst I have to say that I love these curtains. I have two 59" wide windows that I purchased two sets (4 panels per window) for each. The windows are alongside a fireplace and I wanted to pull the curtains to the far side of the windows and keep them drawn to the sides. After putting them up I noticed that a few of the panels were noticeably shorter than the others. We tried adjusting the rod height (I purchased the 108" L) but that adjustment made the discrepancy noticeable from the top. I decided that I wanted more fullness so I purchased two additional sets, and I'm hoping that doubling what I already had will help with the differences in the lengths of the individual panels. Even though this ended up being more than I had intended to spend, I'm happy with the purchase because the material and overall look of the product is high end and attractive. To make this the right purchase for me, I had to place 8 panels (4 sets) on each 59" w rod.*********So the extra panels came in. We added those and the length problem persists. The panels are not all the same length (most are off about an inch to two inches). Even the single panels have some issues with one end at the bottom being higher and this is because the hem on some of the panels is uneven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good customer service and beautiful curtains
reviews.reviewText: I edited my first review with less stars because I was contacted by the seller really fast and everything was handled professionally. Beautiful curtains. I bought 1st set a year ago and they still look beautiful ...even after washing machine and hot dried still no changes... This is a place to buy a beautiful curtains without over paying. They're look very luxurious, good quality material. I won't find this quality curtains anywhere for this price !!! JUST buy Trust me !!!

I purchased the colour black. These are definitely black out curtains. Very soft beautiful material and clean sewing lines. They are very beautiful. Very happy with them. They feel luxurious. Pictures really don't do them justice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 12, 2023
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 1, 2021

reviews.reviewText: The curtains arrived early. They are great quality and they look amazing!! I would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been trying to get the right colour match for my new bed, and these are absolutely perfect! Beautiful, heavy velvet, softly draping. Looks stunning. Very happy 😃
